You will find below the presentations for the _"Workshop: How to describe biological data? A primer to a FAIR approach for now and the future"_, here shortened to [Workshop Biometadata-01](https://biometadata-01.sciencesconf.org/). Source code for the presentations are available on the [Workshop Gitlab](https://git.rwth-aachen.de/clavellab/workshop-biometadata-01).

Make use of the search bar on the top right of the website to look up terms within all presentations or use the categories to filter the type of presentations.

::: {.callout-tip appearance="simple"}
## Navigation Tip
Display the help message by pressing the **`?`** key to help you navigate the interactive presentations!
:::
